Introducing Our Auction Run List!*
- View upcoming auction sales in your area and online
- Search based on auction name, vehicle details, and vehicle distance
- View current prospects interested in auction vehicles
- Save your favorite vehicles to your personal Wishlist
- View condition reports, AutoCheck Scores, Carfax, and more

*Must be subscribed to DMS, Books, or AutoCheck to access

- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes
Photo fixes
Photo fixes

1.Increased Mobile App speed that allows for faster buying decisions
2.Inventory Layout Update
- Redesigned for ease of use – we’ve increased text size, navigation enhancements and page interactions with hyperlinks, arrows, and drop downs.
3.Vehicle Detail Pages
- Added Quick Action Features: Users can now view interested prospect right from the vehicle details page. We’ve improved visibility into AutoCheck and Carfax reports and improved book value and market data reporting speed.
- Users can now edit online marketing descriptions from the vehicle page, and retain the same information as the desktop app.
- Enhanced photo management.
- Users can now add more information using mobile app, with ability to add Title & License, vehicle total adds, costs, packs & write downs, set tasks and reminders, and add multiple notes.

NEW: MAX Digital Integration
- Local Market Pricing – users can access vehicle valuations backed by extensive marketplace data.
- MAX Digital pulls data from millions of VINs across the nation to drive the most accurate valuation possible.
- Access historical sales data and current market trends to purchase vehicles most likely to sell.

Redesigned Auction Tool to improve best buying opportunities
Auction Dashboard: updated layout to include Auctions, Recents, Favorites and Saved Searches.
Auction Home Page: for easier accessibility & preference, users can default to today’s Auctions or Favorite Auctions. Tailored to help user buying flow, Auction views are now grouped by All Auction Vehicles, Inlane Vehicles and Online Vehicles. For user convenience, Auction locations can be searched by Sales Today and Near Me.
Revamped Vehicle Listing: Added customizable Quick Filters to easily sort by Sale date, Auction Distance, Auction House & Location, Inlane Vehicles, Online Vehicles, Lane numbers, Run numbers & Favorites.
Revamped Run List layout: Instant access to live data from Auctions with the ability to quickly scroll through vehicles & navigate to Next & Previous vehicles.
Revamped Auction Vehicle Details: Enhanced Auction buyer experience by highlighting important Vehicle Information.
i. Access to Summary booking reports
ii. Access to History Reports
iii. Market Data with Max Digital
iv. Auction Info

Redesigned Auction Tool to improve best buying opportunities
Auction Dashboard: updated layout to include Auctions, Recents, Favorites and Saved Searches.
Auction Home Page: for easier accessibility & preference, users can default to today’s Auctions or Favorite Auctions. Tailored to help user buying flow, Auction views are now grouped by All Auction Vehicles, Inlane Vehicles and Online Vehicles. For user convenience, Auction locations can be searched by Sales Today and Near Me.
Revamped Vehicle Listing: Added customizable Quick Filters to easily sort by Sale date, Auction Distance, Auction House & Location, Inlane Vehicles, Online Vehicles, Lane numbers, Run numbers & Favorites.
Revamped Run List layout: Instant access to live data from Auctions with the ability to quickly scroll through vehicles & navigate to Next & Previous vehicles.
Revamped Auction Vehicle Details: Enhanced Auction buyer experience by highlighting important Vehicle Information.
i. Access to Summary booking reports
ii. Access to History Reports
iii. Market Data with Max Digital
iv. Auction Info

Enhanced capabilities to help manage your Inventory & CRM
Manage day-to-day inventory activities, with access to complete vehicle build information, title brand and vehicle inspection statuses
Our revamped CRM Dashboard allows you to directly add new customers, follow-up prospects, add customer Driver License Expiration & State
Easily complete signup page for Sirius XM Radio Activation
Enhanced our Auction Quick Filter layouts
